mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS reviewCount FROM REVIEW WHERE eId = #{eId}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTCNT FROM (SELECT rv.rvId, rv.eId, rv.user_id, rv.rvComment, rv.rvScore, rv.rvWrittenDate, rv.rvModifyDate, u.uNickname FROM REVIEW rv, USERS u WHERE rv.user_id = u.user_id AND rv.eId = #{eId} ORDER BY rv.rvmodifydate DESC) A) WHERE RNUM >= #{rvCriteria.startNum} AND RNUM <= #{rvCriteria.endNum}
SELECT rv.eId, TRUNC(AVG(rv.rvScore), 1) FROM REVIEW rv, EATING e where e.eId = rv.eId GROUP BY rv.eId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(rvId, rvComment, rvScore, rvWrittenDate, rvModifyDate, eId, user_id) VALUES(REVIEW_SEQ.nextval, #{reviewVO.rvComment}, #{reviewVO.rvScore}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{reviewVO.eId}, #{reviewVO.user_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET rvComment = #{reviewVO.rvComment}, rvScore = #{reviewVO.rvScore}, rvModifyDate = SYSDATE WHERE rvId = #{reviewVO.rvId}
